author: Lucas Kelm
description: The merest hint of hazelnut liqueur makes this relatively light and approachable Negroni.
name: Murano Negroni
recipeIngredient: 2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
